AGREEMENT.ENTREPRENEUR:
Continuing I
permit authorized bank to provide information on this payment and (or) money transfer in law enforcement agencies of the Republic of Kazakhstan and (or) the National Bank;

I confirm that this payment and (or) money transfer is not related to execution of the Currency Contract under which it is required to receive tracking number (for residents);

I confirm, that this payment and (or) money transfer is not related to funding of the terroristic or extremism activities or by other method for support of the terrorism or extremism.
AGREEMENT.CORPORATE: Continuing, I confirm, that money transfer is not related to execution of the Currency Contract under which it is required to appoint a tracking number.

ADD_CONTRACT_MODAL.HEADING: Add Contract/document
ADD_CONTRACT_MODAL.DESCRIPTION:
Size of one file cannot exceed 5 MB.
Formats: PDF, JPG, JPEG, DOC, PNG, TIF.
ADD_CONTRACT_MODAL.AGREEMENT:
Continuing, I confirm,
- that I agree to receive a tracking number to assigned Currency Contract that has a relation to export or import of the goods , and I was notified on terms of receipt of a tracking number ;
- that subject to absence of total sum of the Contract, to fulfill an accounting registration of the Contract with reference amount of 50,000.01 USD (for increase in sum it is necessary to send a letter in the bank);
- that in case of successful verification of the Contract a commission will be charged as per my tariff plan.
ADD_CONTRACT_MODAL.COMMISSION_HELPER: Commission will be withdrawn based on your plan

MODAL.TITLE:
Welcome,
{{ name }}!
MODAL.DESCRIPTION:
We are glad to see you in Jusan Business.
Let us acquaint you with banking, select the theme required for you:

REGISTER.TITLE: Do you from ATF?
REGISTER.TEXT:
For the first login, please pass a registration.
For the following times, please, use use a password for login.

ACCOUNTS.TITLE: Brief review of banking
ACCOUNTS.TEXT: All you accounts with updated details of Jusan Bank are shown on a main page. Click on account in order to review statement and details.

CREATE_PAYMENT.TITLE: Creation of payments
CREATE_PAYMENT.TEXT: Create payments in tenge, currency, conversion or transfers between accounts by click on "Create" button.

IMPORT_PAYMENT.TITLE: Import from 1C
IMPORT_PAYMENT.TEXT: Import files from 1C by click on "Import" button.

COMPANY_CHANGE.TITLE: Company change
COMPANY_CHANGE.TEXT: If you have more than one company, you may with it.

HISTORY.TITLE: Operations' history
HISTORY.TEXT:
In history payments are available
in statuses “To sign”,
“In processing”, “Completed”, “Rejected”,
as well as “Draft"

CONTRACTS.TITLE: Work with Contracts
CONTRACTS.TEXT: You can find here management by Currency Contract

DICTIONARIES.TITLE: Counterparties and employees
DICTIONARIES.TEXT:
List of your counterparties and company's employees is available in "Directory" for quick
and convenient management

SETTINGS.TITLE: Settings
SETTINGS.TEXT: Basic data on company, authorized person and change of an access password in this section

ACCOUNT.TITLE: Accounts from ATF
ACCOUNT.TEXT: Click on account in order to review statement and details

NAV.TITLE: Account details
NAV.TEXT: Here you can find old and new account details

ACCOUNT.TITLE: Account from ATF
ACCOUNT.TEXT: Click on account in order to review statement and details

FILTER.TITLE: Select date
FILTER.TEXT: By default the operations are shown for today in the statement. Select data and your statement will be shown as a list below.

TRANSACTIONS.TITLE: Statement
TRANSACTIONS.TEXT: Here you will find the transactions for account for the period selected

NAV.TITLE: All payments
NAV.TEXT: Here all old payments from Atf are available, new payments to sign, drafts and returns.

REPEAT.TITLE: Repeat
REPEAT.TEXT: Click on an repeat icon in order to create a new similar payment
